TOOLBAR_RESISTOR_COLOR_CODE.description: Option in the Help Menu which opens a dialog that makes a connection between the color of a resistor and it's value

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_FROM_COLOR_TO_NUMBER.description: Options that transforms the color in a value

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_FROM_NUMBER_TO_COLOR.description: Option that transforms the value in a color

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_STRIPES.description: Number of stripes in the resistor

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_RESISTANCE.description: Label for the value of the resistance
